info.author: Graham Horwood
info.description:
For a given input sentence, combinations of upper, lower, and title cased words
are combined into a weighted trigram graph, the weight being the log probability
of the trigram on a language model. The optimal casing is the graph path with
the highest LM likelihood.
info.name: pyrecase
info.summary: Recases input text according to a language model.
info.html_description: For a given input sentence, combinations of upper, lower, and title cased words are combined into a weighted trigram graph, the weight being the log probability of the trigram on a language model. The optimal casing is the graph path with the highest LM likelihood.
